articles.author: Lara Herrero, The Conversation
articles.title: A New Covid Variant Is Rising Fast. Here’s What We Know About NB.1.8.1 - Gizmodo
articles.description: A new Omicron offshoot is spreading fast across Australia and Asia, prompting renewed concerns about the covid-19 pandemic.
articles.content:
As we enter the colder months in Australia, covid is making headlines again, this time due to the emergence of a new variant: NB.1.8.1.
Last week, the World Health Organization designated NB.1.8.1 a… [+4529 chars]
